quest.name: The Fires Fade
journal: The haunted look in Raubahn's eyes speaks volumes...

dialogue.name: RAUBAHN
dialogue.text: See to the wounded, Forename. If they live, help them. If not, move on.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Meffrid lies motionless, having breathed his last. Clenched in his fist is a small charm, which you take for safekeeping.

dialogue.name: WISCAR
dialogue.text:
He was already cold when I got to him... There was naught I could do.
That charm must've been important. You'd best take it to Conrad.

dialogue.name: WISCAR
dialogue.text: Godsdammit Meffrid... Weren't you the one telling me to use my head and stay alive...

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You spare another moment for Meffrid, before turning away. Fishing in your pockets, your hand closes around his charm. Conrad must be told.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Heh...heh heh... You seem ready to burst into tears. I'd...fetch you a handkerchief, but...

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Damn it, Alisaie! This is serious! You need rest!

dialogue.name: PIPIN
dialogue.text: It makes no sense. He brushed us aside as if we were nothing...

dialogue.name: KRILE
dialogue.text: You're worried about Y'shtola, aren't you? <sigh> It's too early to make any kind of prognosis, but...she's alive. For now.

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text:
If it wasn't for her, it'd be me lying there...
...I wish it was.

dialogue.name: CONRAD
dialogue.text: Meffrid was a worrier. Always thinking about others before himself. He once had an imperial patrol chase him nigh on twenty malms so that his wounded would have time to escape...

dialogue.name: CONRAD
dialogue.text: His comrades loved him for it, of course...though that only made him worry more. Did you know that he sent his men in Quarrymill away because he thought they were fighting for him, and not the cause? Aye, well, he did. The only life he was willing to risk was his own, you see.

dialogue.name: CONRAD
dialogue.text: But that's exactly the kind of man who should be leader! The kind of man who deserves to survive. Not a...not an old fool who's all used up.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: ...There's no logic to it, Master Kemp. There never is.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Who stands, who falls... In the heat of battle, we can but do our best─as he did. Meffrid will be sorely missed, aye...but because of his sacrifice, many now live who otherwise would not─and they need us, now more than ever.

dialogue.name: CONRAD
dialogue.text: Aye...aye, that they do. Forgive me. I had...high hopes for him, is all...
